block.tooltip: Triggers when a message is deleted

generator: _return = '\\nconfig.messageDelete = async message => { if (message.guild.id != "' + data.req.body.guild + '") return; try {' + Blockly.JavaScript.statementToCode(block, 'code') + '} catch (e) { onError("' + data.req.body.guild  + '", e); } }'
